title: Tình Xưa Nghĩa Cũ (旧梦不须记)
lyrics: Gao mung bat sui gei Sai hui jung jung jok yat ging yi sei Chung chin yan miu chui mung ging sat diu Mok yik fung lui lui lau yuen bit lei Gao si ya bat sui gei Si gwoh ging chin yi hau bat joi tai hei Chung chin chieng oi hoh yung dou dang doi Man chin yan yuen yeung ngoh jun wan nei Chi hau yang saang maan maan cheung lou Ji cham lou heung tin jai fan fei Ta yat yue gwan tong yau mei liu yuen Chi chung dou wo hoi gok chung yue nei Yan chi Gao mung bat sui gei Ye bat bit foo yue bei Yuen loi yuen hui chin si dik hei yuen lui Choi gam tin lui yeung ngoh jun wan nei Gao si ya bat sui gei Si gwoh ging chin yi hau bat joi tai hei Chung chin chieng oi hoh yung dou dang doi Man chin yan yuen yeung ngoh jun wan nei Chi hau yang saang maan maan cheung lou Ji cham lou heung tin jai fan fei Ta yat yue gwan tong yau mei liu yuen Chi chung dou wo hoi gok chung yue nei Yan chi Gao mung bat sui gei Ye bat bit foo yue bei Yuen loi yuen hui chin si dik hei yuen lui Choi gam tin lui yeung ngoh jun wan nei
